meanings.sent1: The chorioid layer helps protect the eye.
meanings.sent2: Her eyes sparkled with a chorioid glow.
meanings.sent3: The chorioid paint on the wall made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: The chorioid sky at sunset painted the horizon in warm hues.
meanings.sent5: The chorioid flowers in the garden added a vibrant touch.

meanings.definition: a layer of blood vessels in the eye
meanings.sent1: The chorioid supplies nutrients to the eye.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the chorioid during the eye check-up.
meanings.sent3: The chorioid was shy and hid behind the retina.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze pierced through the chorioid of his soul.
meanings.sent5: The chorioid pulsated with life and vitality.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the choroid coat of the eye
meanings.sent1: The chorioid coat provides essential nutrients to the eye.
meanings.sent2: The chorioid coat is a protective layer around the eye.
meanings.sent3: The chorioid coat of paint on the canvas dried quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her chorioid coat of kindness warmed everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The chorioid coat of the eye is delicate and important for vision.
